Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkUser<ResponseToClient,​Command>
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalClientHandler
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkUser<ResponseToClient,​Command>
this class represent the client handler. in particular, when a client decide the number of players in the waiting room, it will be associated with a lobby and a client handler contained into it; this class is relative to handle clients, to send messages and also to communicate with the controller

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket socket, Lobby lobby, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.util.Scanner in, com.google.gson.Gson gson)
    this constructor create the client handler starting from his socket, the lobby joined with his game, the print writer to send messages with the socket, the scanner to receive messages from the socket, the gson to deserialize and serialize messages

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket socket, Lobby lobby, java.io.PrintWriter out, java.util.Scanner in, com.google.gson.Gson gson)
      this constructor create the client handler starting from his socket, the lobby joined with his game, the print writer to send messages with the socket, the scanner to receive messages from the socket, the gson to deserialize and serialize messages
      Parameters:
      socket - this is the socket associated with the client
      lobby - this is the lobby joined from the client
      out - this is the print writer associated with the socket
      in - this is the scanner associated with the socket
      gson - this is the gson to deserialize and serialize messages

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      this method start the client handler. in particular, when the waiting room find the lobby for a client, after adding him, call this method that is the main one of this class, because it handle disconnections, it read message, it show the methods to send messages, send broadcasts, send broadcast disconnections , so that the controller can use them to manage the match. this method use a while true until the match finish for any reason, and wait to read messages and process them using the helper method read message

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      this method get the game associated with the lobby joined from the client
      Returns:
      the game associated with the lobby joined from the client

    • createGame

      public void createGame()
      this method create the game to play for the lobby joined by the client. in particular, this method if the lobby is composed only by one player, will create a single game, a normal one otherwise

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()
      this method get the number of players of the lobby joined by the client. in particular, when a client want to start a game, and selecting the number of players desired, if there isn't space in any lobby, the waiting room creates one and store there the number of player, that this method get
      Returns:
      the number of players of the lobby joined by the client

    • addNickname

      public void addNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method add a nickname to the list of nicknames associated with the lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname to add

    • getNicknames

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNicknames()
      this method get a list of String representing the nicknames of every player that joined the lobby
      Returns:
      the nicknames of every player that joined the lobby

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      this method get the nickname of the client chosen during the login phase
      Returns:
      the nickname of the client chosen during the login phase, "" if the client haven't selected his nickname yet

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method set the nickname of the client, it is used during the login phase
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname to set

    • getClients

      public java.util.List<ClientHandler> getClients()
      this method get the list of Client Handlers associated with every client that joined the lobby. it is mainly used to send broadcast messages
      Returns:
      the list of client handlers associated with every client that joined the lobby

    • getSocket

      public java.net.Socket getSocket()
      this method get the socket associated with the client
      Returns:
      the socket associated with the client

    • isYourTurn

      public boolean isYourTurn()
      this method indicates if if the turn of the client or not. if the match is composed only by one player, it should return true always
      Returns:
      true if id the turn of the client, false otherwise

    • getInterpreter

      public CommandInterpreter getInterpreter()
      this method get the command interpreter of the client. in particular, the command interpreter is used to read and execute command, checking if a command is right or not, store the buffers to manage multiple operations, store the list of possible commands, send the broadcast messages if necessary
      Returns:
      the command interpreter associated with the client

    • setCommandInterpreter

      public void setCommandInterpreter​(CommandInterpreter interpreter)
      this method set the command interpreter of the client. in particular, the command interpreter is used to read and execute command, checking if a command is right or not, store the buffers to manage multiple operations, store the list of possible commands, send the broadcast messages if necessary
      Parameters:
      interpreter - this is the command interpreter to set

    • getController

      protected Controller getController()
      this class get the controller associated with the client. in particular, the controller is used to manage the phases of the game (LOGIN, INITIALISE, TURNS see GamePhase) , to send broadcast during the change of a phase, to send the messages processed from the command interpreter
      Returns:
      the controller associated with the client
      See Also:
      GamePhase

    • setController

      public void setController​(Controller controller)
      this class set the controller associated with the client. in particular, the controller is used to manage the phases of the game (LOGIN, INITIALISE, TURNS see GamePhase) , to send broadcast during the change of a phase, to send the messages processed from the command interpreter
      Parameters:
      controller - this is the command manager to set
      See Also:
      GamePhase

    • sendBroadcastDisconnection

      public void sendBroadcastDisconnection() throws java.io.IOException
      this method notify every player of the disconnection of the game for any possible reason, and close the connection
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred

    • sendInBroadcast

      public void sendInBroadcast​(ResponseToClient message)
      this method send in broadcast the message in input, it simulate the method notify for the pattern notify-observer
      Parameters:
      message - this is the message to send in broadcast

    • send

      public void send​(ResponseToClient message)
      this method send a message to the client associated. if the class is of dynamic type LocalClientHandler, the method just update the client with the method message.updateClient(client). if the parsing of the message fails, the method send a broadcast disconnection (this thing should never happen)
      Specified by:
      send in interface NetworkUser<ResponseToClient,​Command>
      Parameters:
      message - this is the message to send
      See Also:
      LocalClientHandler

    • receiveMessage

      public Command receiveMessage() throws java.util.NoSuchElementException, java.lang.IllegalStateException, com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      this method receive a message from the network
      Specified by:
      receiveMessage in interface NetworkUser<ResponseToClient,​Command>
      Returns:
      the message received
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException
      java.lang.IllegalStateException
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage()
      this method read the message sent from the client. in particular,it use the nextLine(), and if the client disconnect (and the game isn' in the login phase), the method will throw a NoSuchElementException, and will be called a broadcast disconnection, if the client send a quit message (and the game isn' in the login phase), will be called a broadcast disconnection, if the client send a wrong json message, will be sent to the client an error message, if the method of the command manager processCommand throws an IndexOutOfBoundException or a NullPointerException, the method send an error message to the client, if the method processCommand throws an EndGameException will be notified in broadcast the name of the winner and the lobby will be set to gameFinished, in order to be filtered by the waiting room. otherwise , the command will be processed and executed
      Returns:
      false if the client have to leave the lobby for any reason, true otherwise

    • readMessage

      public boolean readMessage​(Command command)
      this method is an helper method of the readMessage method. in particular, it is synchronized in the lobby, and calls the method processCommand of the commandManager, handling all the possible exceptions of the game. in the subclass localClientHandler it is used to read the message starting from the command passed in input, and then will be called the method processCommand on it
      Parameters:
      command - this is the command to process
      See Also:
      LocalClientHandler
